articles.description: The Giants' offseason goal was to take strides toward being a contender without skipping any steps in the process. So, how'd they do?
articles.content: In some ways, Joe Schoens first offseason as Giants general manager was easier than Year 2. Last year, Schoen mostly cleaned up the salary cap and held off on making any major financial investments.… [+12197 chars]

articles.title: Conner Mantz headlines big Utah contingent at USA track and field championships - Deseret News
articles.description: Mantz will be one of a dozen current or former BYU athletes who will compete in the championships Thursday through Sunday.
articles.content: Conner Mantz, the former BYU national champion who seems to show up everywhere in the running world these days, is apparently recovered from a near blackout performance in the Boston Marathon. He wil… [+5605 chars]
